data.name: The Maiden, the Butler, and the Witch
data.detailed_description:
Latest Release

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1419750/Apostle_Rebellion/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342120/Castaway_of_the_Ardusta_Sea/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989450/Public_Defense_Corp_The_Ambassador_of_Peace/


Upcoming Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724320/Noelle_Does_Her_Best/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198850/How_to_Build_a_Magnificent_Kingdom/


About the Game



Irina, born and raised as the daughter of a witch, is about to embark on her training in accordance to tradition. However, the Demon Lord has erected a castle and monsters roam the island, threatening its citizens...

Her butler, who has supported her since she was young, walks beside her on her journey.

Irina's path will be filled with danger, and she must overcome many perils to become a full-fledged witch.

How her journey unfolds will be entirely up to you.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Multiple Endings
data.about_the_game:
Irina, born and raised as the daughter of a witch, is about to embark on her training in accordance to tradition. However, the Demon Lord has erected a castle and monsters roam the island, threatening its citizens...

Her butler, who has supported her since she was young, walks beside her on her journey.

Irina's path will be filled with danger, and she must overcome many perils to become a full-fledged witch.

How her journey unfolds will be entirely up to you.

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Multiple Endings
data.short_description: A classic-style turn-based RPG. Irina must leave her home and embark on a journey to complete her training to become a witch. However, the Demon Lord has built a castle on the island, and unleashed monsters who threaten its citizens.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: The Maiden, the Butler, and the Witch contains strong language.
